item.title: Need help editing this code
item.dc:creator: @ITANKturmoil ITANKturmoil
item.description:
@ITANKturmoil wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:4, topic:338597”][quote author=Czar y2k link=topic=434984.msg3194477#msg3194477 date=1272648956]

if(wearID == 1645) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("itankturmoil")) { sM("you need to be a owner to wear a p ring"); return false; }
[/quote]

Use the unary (!) operator like so or else it won’t work:

if(wearID == 1645) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("itankturmoil")) return false;[/quote]

if(wearID == 10106) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("itankturmoil")) { sM("Only ITANKturmoil can use this"); return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Need help editing this code
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Czar y2k, post:2, topic:338597”]if(wearID == 1645) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("itankturmoil")) { sM("you need to be a owner to wear a p ring"); return false; }[/quote]

Use the unary (!) operator like so or else it won’t work:

if((wearID == 1645) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("itankturmoil")) return false;

Read full topic

item.description:
@ITANKturmoil wrote:

if(wearID == 1645 && (playerRights <= 3)) { // by ITANKturmoil sM("You Need To Be A Owner To Wear A P Ring."); return false; }

i need to make it so only i can use this item i thought this would work

if(wearID == 1645 && (itankturmoil)) { // by ITANKturmoil sM("You Need To Be A Owner To Wear A P Ring."); return false; }
